00038   class LockRequest {
00039   public:
00040     LockRequest(uint64_t h, int m) : handle(h), mode(m) { return; }
00041     uint64_t handle;
00042     int mode;

00045   class NodeData : public Hypertable::ReferenceCount {
00046   public:
00047     NodeData() : ephemeral(false), cur_lock_mode(0), lock_generation(0),
00048                  exclusive_lock_handle(0) { }
00049     void add_handle(uint64_t handle, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00050       handle_map[handle] = handle_data;
00051     }
00052 
00053     bool remove_handle(uint64_t handle) {
00054       HandleMap::iterator iter = handle_map.find(handle);
00055       if (iter != handle_map.end()) {
00056         handle_map.erase(iter);
00057         return true;
00058       }
00059       return false;
00060     }
00061 
00062     unsigned int reference_count() {
00063       return handle_map.size();
00064     }
00065 
00066     typedef hash_map<uint64_t, HandleDataPtr> HandleMap;
00067     typedef std::set<uint64_t> LockHandleSet;
00068     typedef std::list<LockRequest> LockRequestList;
00069 
00070     boost::mutex mutex;
00071     String      name;
00072     bool        ephemeral;
00073     HandleMap   handle_map;
00074     uint32_t    cur_lock_mode;
00075     uint64_t    lock_generation;
00076     LockHandleSet shared_lock_handles;
00077     uint64_t    exclusive_lock_handle;
00078     LockRequestList pending_lock_reqs;
00079   };
00080 
00081   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<NodeData> NodeDataPtr;

00083 }
